description: Try our easy to follow Mixed Greens recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Mixed Greens Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Blanch trimmed green beans in boiling, salted water for 3 minutes. Drain and return to pan with 2 cups of shredded cabbage and frozen peas.
Add butter, garlic clove and freshly ground black pepper.
Toss for 1 or 2 minutes until cabbage wilts. Add lemon juice and serve.
